verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> against Babylon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [and] against the land כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet

הַגִּ֨ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> Declare בַגּוֹיִ֤ם <S%H1471><s%> ye among the nations וְהַשְׁמִ֙יעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> and publish וּֽשְׂאוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> and set up נֵ֔ס <S%H5251><s%> a standard הַשְׁמִ֖יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> publish אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּכַחֵ֑דוּ <S%H3582><s%> [and] conceal אִמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> not say נִלְכְּדָ֨ה <S%H3920><s%> is taken בָבֶ֜ל <S%H894><s%> Babylon הֹבִ֥ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> is confounded בֵּל֙ <S%H1078><s%> Bel חַ֣ת <S%H2865><s%> is broken in pieces מְרֹדָ֔ךְ <S%H4781><s%> Merodach הֹבִ֣ישׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> are confounded עֲצַבֶּ֔יהָ <S%H6091><s%> her idols חַ֖תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> are broken in pieces גִּלּוּלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1544><s%> her images

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עָלָה֩ <S%H5927><s%> there cometh up עָלֶ֨יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against גּ֜וֹי <S%H1471><s%> a nation מִצָּפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> For out of the north הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> it יָשִׁ֤ית <S%H7896><s%> against her which shall make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָהּ֙ <S%H776><s%> her land לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H8047><s%> desolate וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> and none shall dwell בָּ֑הּ מֵאָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> both man וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> and beast נָ֥דוּ <S%H5110><s%> therein they shall remove הָלָֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> they shall depart

בַּיָּמִ֨ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵ֜מָּה <S%H1992><s%> those וּבָעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> and in that time הַהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God יָבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> those וּבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> they and the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together הָל֤וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> going וּבָכוֹ֙ <S%H1058><s%> and weeping יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> go וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> their God יְבַקֵּֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H1245><s%> and seek

צִיּ֣וֹן <S%H6726><s%> to Zion יִשְׁאָ֔לוּ <S%H7592><s%> They shall ask דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way הֵ֣נָּה <S%H2008><s%> thitherward פְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> with their faces בֹּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> [saying] Come וְנִלְו֣וּ <S%H3867><s%> and let us join אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> ourselves to the LORD בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> in a perpetual לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשָּׁכֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7911><s%> [that] shall not be forgotten ס

צֹ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep אֹֽבְדוֹת֙ <S%H6><s%> hath been lost [הָיָה כ] (הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become ק) עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> My people רֹעֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H7462><s%> their shepherds הִתְע֔וּם <S%H8582><s%> have caused them to go astray הָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> [on] the mountains [שֹׁובֵבִים כ] (שֹֽׁובְב֑וּם <S%H7726><s%> backsliding ק) מֵהַ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> from mountain אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גִּבְעָה֙ <S%H1389><s%> to hill הָלָ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> they have gone שָׁכְח֖וּ <S%H7911><s%> they have forgotten רִבְצָֽם׃ <S%H7258><s%> their restingplace

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מוֹצְאֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4672><s%> All that found אֲכָל֔וּם <S%H398><s%> them have devoured וְצָרֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H6862><s%> them and their adversaries אָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not נֶאְשָׁ֑ם <S%H816><s%> We offend תַּ֗חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> as they חָטְא֤וּ <S%H2398><s%> not because they have sinned לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD נְוֵה־ <S%H5116><s%> the habitation צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of justice וּמִקְוֵ֥ה <S%H4723><s%> the hope אֲבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> even the LORD ס

נֻ֚דוּ <S%H5110><s%> Remove מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וּמֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans [יָצְאוּ כ] (צֵ֑אוּ <S%H3318><s%> after ק) וִהְי֕וּ <S%H1961><s%> like כְּעַתּוּדִ֖ים <S%H6260><s%> and be as the he goats לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> the flocks

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָנֹכִ֡י <S%H595><s%> I מֵעִיר֩ <S%H5782><s%> For lo I will raise וּמַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> and cause to come up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בָּבֶ֜ל <S%H894><s%> against Babylon קְהַל־ <S%H6951><s%> an assembly גּוֹיִ֤ם <S%H1471><s%> nations גְּדֹלִים֙ <S%H1419><s%> of great מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country צָפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> from the north וְעָ֣רְכוּ <S%H6186><s%> and they shall set themselves in array לָ֔הּ מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there תִּלָּכֵ֑ד <S%H3920><s%> against her from thence she shall be taken חִצָּיו֙ <S%H2671><s%> their arrows כְּגִבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> [shall be] as of a mighty מַשְׁכִּ֔יל <S%H7919><s%> an expert לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> none shall return רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> in vain

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become כַשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> And Chaldea לְשָׁלָ֑ל <S%H7998><s%> shall be a spoil כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All שֹׁלְלֶ֥יהָ <S%H7997><s%> all that spoil יִשְׂבָּ֖עוּ <S%H7646><s%> her shall be satisfied נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because [תִשְׂמְחִי כ] (תִשְׂמְחוּ֙ <S%H8055><s%> cheer up ק) כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because [תַעֲלְזִי כ] (תַֽעַלְז֔וּ <S%H5937><s%> be joyful ק) שֹׁסֵ֖י <S%H8154><s%> O ye destroyers נַחֲלָתִ֑י <S%H5159><s%> of mine heritage כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because [תָפוּשִׁי כ] (תָפ֙וּשׁוּ֙ <S%H6335><s%> grow up ק) כְּעֶגְלָ֣ה <S%H5697><s%> as the heifer דָשָׁ֔ה <S%H1877><s%> grass [וְתִצְהֲלִי כ] (וְתִצְהֲל֖וּ <S%H6670><s%> bellow ק) כָּאֲבִּרִֽים׃ <S%H47><s%> as bulls

בּ֤וֹשָׁה <S%H954><s%> confounded אִמְּכֶם֙ <S%H517><s%> Your mother מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> shall be sore חָפְרָ֖ה <S%H2659><s%> you shall be ashamed יֽוֹלַדְתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H3205><s%> she that bare הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַחֲרִ֣ית <S%H319><s%> behold the hindermost גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations מִדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> [shall be] a wilderness צִיָּ֥ה <S%H6723><s%> a dry land וַעֲרָבָֽה׃ <S%H6160><s%> and a desert

מִקֶּ֤צֶף <S%H7110><s%> Because of the wrath יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵשֵׁ֔ב <S%H3427><s%> it shall not be inhabited וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> but it shall be wholly desolate כֻּלָּ֑הּ <S%H3605><s%> will be completely כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> Everyone עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> every one that goeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> by Babylon יִשֹּׁ֥ם <S%H8074><s%> shall be astonished וְיִשְׁרֹ֖ק <S%H8319><s%> and hiss עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all מַכּוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H4347><s%> at all her plagues

עִרְכ֨וּ <S%H6186><s%> Put yourselves in array עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בָּבֶ֤ל ׀ <S%H894><s%> against Babylon סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> round about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All דֹּ֣רְכֵי <S%H1869><s%> all ye that bend קֶ֔שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> the bow יְד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> shoot אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> about אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּחְמְל֖וּ <S%H2550><s%> at her spare אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with חֵ֑ץ <S%H2671><s%> no arrows כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> against לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD חָטָֽאָה׃ <S%H2398><s%> for she hath sinned

הָרִ֨יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> Shout עָלֶ֤יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> against her round about נָתְנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> she hath given יָדָ֔הּ <S%H3027><s%> her hand נָֽפְלוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> are fallen [אַשְׁוִיֹּתֶיהָ כ] (אָשְׁיֹותֶ֔יהָ <S%H803><s%> foundation ק) נֶהֶרְס֖וּ <S%H2040><s%> are thrown down חֽוֹמוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H2346><s%> her walls כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for נִקְמַ֨ת <S%H5360><s%> for it [is] the vengeance יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> this הִנָּ֣קְמוּ <S%H5358><s%> take vengeance בָ֔הּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> her עָשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> upon her as she hath done עֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> do לָֽהּ׃

כִּרְת֤וּ <S%H3772><s%> Cut off זוֹרֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H2232><s%> the sower מִבָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> from Babylon וְתֹפֵ֥שׂ <S%H8610><s%> and him that handleth מַגָּ֖ל <S%H4038><s%> the sickle בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time קָצִ֑יר <S%H7105><s%> of harvest מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> for fear חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword הַיּוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3238><s%> of the oppressing אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עַמּוֹ֙ <S%H5971><s%> to his people יִפְנ֔וּ <S%H6437><s%> they shall turn וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לְאַרְצ֖וֹ <S%H776><s%> to his own land יָנֻֽסוּ׃ <S%H5127><s%> and they shall flee ס

שֶׂ֧ה <S%H7716><s%> sheep פְזוּרָ֛ה <S%H6340><s%> [is] a scattered יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֲרָי֣וֹת <S%H738><s%> the lions הִדִּ֑יחוּ <S%H5080><s%> have driven [him] away הָרִאשׁ֤וֹן <S%H7223><s%> first אֲכָלוֹ֙ <S%H398><s%> hath devoured מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְזֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> and this הָאַחֲרוֹן֙ <S%H314><s%> him and last עִצְּמ֔וֹ <S%H6105><s%> hath broken his bones נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> this Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> I am going פֹקֵ֛ד <S%H6485><s%> Behold I will punish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> and his land כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I פָּקַ֖דְתִּי <S%H6485><s%> as I have punished אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria
